suite.name: Invalid Edit Highlight

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'วิทยาลัยการคอมพิวเตอร์ มหาวิทยาลัยขอนแก่น ขอแสดงความยินดีกับ ศ. ดร.จักรชัย โสอินทร์ อ. ดร.ญานิกา คงโสรส อ. ดร.เพชร อิ่มทองคำ และ Mr.Chenset Kim เนื่องในโอกาสที่บทความวิจัยได้รับการตีพิมพ์ในวารสารวิชาการระดับนานาชาติ จำนวน 1 บทความวิจัย' into text field 'xpath=//input[@name='description']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Choose File
kw.doc: Inputs the ``file_path`` into the file input field ``locator``.

kw.name: Select From List By Value
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'xpath=//select[@id='researcherSelect']' by value 3.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.

kw.name: Select From List By Index
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'xpath=//select[@id='paperSelect']' by index 1.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``indexes``.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Select From List By Value
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'xpath=//select[@name='isSelected']' by value 1.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//div[@class='alert alert-danger']' contains text 'The title field is required.'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
